infos: Once your GoXLR is connected you'll be able to allow your viewers to enable an FX preset or play Samples from a channel point rewards, a chat command, a subscription, bits, ... or show an OBS source when mute or bleep button is pressed or when a fader is muted.
You will also be able to scroll any chat column or move the read mark from the encoders.

connect_form.title: Credentials
connect_form.ip_security:
Due to web browsers security, if you set an IP other than "127.0.0.1" or "localhost" the connection must be secured.
 If you want to connect to a remote desktop you must use an https tunnel (like Ngrok).
Come ask for help on {LINK} if you don't know how to do that.

If your GoXLR is on this computer, set 127.0.0.1 as IP.
